title: DewlanceVPS
author: DewlanceVPS
content: Hi BitcoinTalk Members,Dewlance was founded on 21 February 2009. Our Company is Registered, and we've been in business for the last 13 years.If you are looking for a premium service and fast support system, then Dewlance is your best option.We accept Bitcoin, Dogecoin, BCH and many other cryptocurrencies.Features:- Free Domain*- Free SSL Certificate- 24X7 support system- Unlimited NVMe Storage- Unmetered Bandwidth- One-click WordPress installer- Free Website Migration- Softaculous- CDN* (*Available with Gold Premium Plan)- HTTP/2- CloudLinux- Website Builder- 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee- Free website backups- Fully Managed- Live Chat SupportOur Premium Hosting Plans:Plan Name: BronzeHost 1 WebsiteUnlimited NVMe StorageUnmetered Bandwidth50 MySQL DatabasescPanelPrice: $2.76/moBuy NowPlan Name: SilverHost Unlimited WebsitesUnlimited NVMe StorageUnmetered BandwidthUnlimited MySQL DatabasescPanelPrice: $3.46/moBuy NowPlan Name: GoldHost Unlimited WebsitesUnlimited NVMe StorageUnmetered BandwidthCDNFree Yearly SSLUnlimited MySQL DatabasescPanelPrice: $5.16/moBuy NowServer Location?- United StatesPayment Method?- PayPal (Verified Only)- Perfect Money- Bitcoins/Litcoins- Ethereum- PayUMoney- NEFT PaymentCan you migrate my site or accounts?Yes, please open a ticket after placing an order.Your server speed is fast?Yes, you can check it. We provide a 30-day money-back guarantee.Why Choose DewlanceÂ®?- Fast Server.- 24x7 Help and Support.- Our company was established in 2009 (13 Years).- 99.9% Server Uptime Guarantee.- No Penalty Fees on Overdue Invoices.- Instant Setup.- We use Latest Up-to-Date Software.- DirectAdmin + Softaculous.- Free LetsEncrypt SSL (Unlimited)- Step by Step Video & Text-Based Tutorials.- We take a backup of accounts on every day, every other day, weekly & monthly backup.- We respect each customer and always try to give our best.- We accept Crypto.Thanks.Dewlance.

comments.author: DewlanceVPS
comments.body: We are celebrating 14th Anniversary. So we have extended the coupon code: Greet.Take a advantage of our extended discount and buy web hosting at affordable price.
